description: Mauler (an acronym for Mobile Armored Utility Laser-guided E-beam, Revised) is a name used by two fictional characters that appear in comic books published by Marvel Comics. The first version appears in Daredevil #167 (Nov. 1980) and was created by David Michelinie and Frank Miller. The second character first appears in Iron Man #156 (March 1982) and was created by David Michelinie; John Romita, Jr. and Pablo Marcos.
name: Mauler
powers: Electric shock generator on right arm
